posts.title: How to Create and Play an Online Game w/ Studens
posts.summary: Download the file to see general basic instructions to do it
posts.body: Technologies for Humanity Competition - Middle School Level; aims to take the curiosity and sense of discovery gained in primary school to the next level, enabling students to establish a more conscious, productive and creative relationship with technology. The TEKNOFEST Middle School Science and Discovery Competition will be held in four separate categories: Astronomy and Space Technologies, Natural Sciences and Environmental Awareness, Health and Wellness Technologies, Educational Technologies.
